div.a: Middle School Parent Leader In Me Survey

div.p:
Monroe City All-Sports Season Passes are now on sale in the Athletic Office!!!
Family - $125
Individual - $50
Sr. Citizen - $35
Student - $30
#MCPRIDE

This is my last post for the page.
Next Sunday. August 12 @ 4p we will be doing a group photo at the football field please help get the word out to those who may not see this post. Thank you!
I will have all shirts still left in my possession that day so if you would still like to get one and I have your size they will be available .
After the photo all shirts will be given to the Maher family to hand out as they choose. ... See more

I will return to the library on Monday. I will print overdue notices from last school year to send home the first week of school. No, they do not go away. Please parents look for the overdue books. It hurts me to tell a child they cannot check out a book because one is overdue. ... See more
Mark your calendars - August 13th for our Back to School Fair!
